page.title: 10LIFESTYLES 7-11 (2)
page.content: Helping in the home, either chores for parents, responsibility for own belongings, or care of pets - 30 minutes.Watching television 1hour 30 { minutes. Over half the children spend half an hour in private study(musical instruments,etc.) 50% children have a light evening meal separate from their parents. The rest have a full evening dinner with the whole family.Bedtime is usually between 20.00 and 21.00 hours. Over half the children in this age group belong to a youth organisation- cubs, brownies, youth orchestra etc. 95% usually have an organised family holiday away from home - 50% for between 7 and 14 days; 20% spend more than 21 days on annual holiday. 80% of children receive spending money 30% get Â£1.00 weekly(this amount will buy 2 large loaves of bread).
